parameter.value: I am the ruler of Ashbere. I could very well be your ruler, so mind your manners.
Khamos was the founder of this village. He died long ago, but left his fabulous fortune securely protected in impenetrable vaults here in Ashbere.
Elves are intelligent creatures, far more intelligent than humans, as a matter of fact.
A village, or perhaps even a city, which is famously known for its greatness.
Celeres is a pathetic human settlement and it's only a matter of time before my troops will penetrate its defences and seize the city.
Casteldine is far more well guarded than Celeres. I would almost say its thick wall and strong defence makes it an invulnerable human settlement.
King Arturo is the human leader, I remember. He rules from Casteldine.
Paschendale is a horrendous place, really. I would not even wish my worst enemy to go there, but some times we have to inspite of the dreadful creatures living there.
What's on your mind, really, |PLAYERNAME|? Do you believe I will give you anything for coming here and disturbing?
Se'Than is elvish. You don't understand it.
I remember that a man from Adanac sold me this cowl. He said it had a very interesting effect on certain people. Why don't you talk to him?
A human!? What do you want?
